name: py-wrapt
description: Module for decorators, wrappers and monkey patching.

dependent_to.name: py-datalad
dependent_to.description:
data distribution geared toward scientific datasets. DataLad makes data
management and data distribution more accessible. To do that, it stands
on the shoulders of Git and Git-annex to deliver a decentralized system
for data exchange. This includes automated ingestion of data from online
portals and exposing it in readily usable form as Git(-annex)
repositories, so-called datasets. The actual data storage and permission
management, however, remains with the original data providers.

dependent_to.name: py-inference-schema
dependent_to.description:
This package is intended to provide a uniform schema for common machine
learning applications, as well as a set of decorators that can be used
to aid in web based ML prediction applications.

dependent_to.name: py-aiobotocore
dependent_to.description: Async client for amazon services using botocore and aiohttp/asyncio.

dependent_to.name: py-devlib
dependent_to.description: Library for interaction with and instrumentation of remote devices.

dependent_to.name: py-astroid
dependent_to.description:
A common base representation of python source code for pylint and other
projects.

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description: Snakemake is an MIT-licensed workflow management system.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow
dependent_to.description: TensorFlow is an Open Source Software Library for Machine Intelligence

dependent_to.name: py-workload-automation
dependent_to.description:
Workload Automation (WA) is a framework for executing workloads and
collecting measurements on Android and Linux devices.

dependent_to.name: py-deprecated
dependent_to.description:
Python @deprecated decorator to deprecate old python classes, functions
or methods.

dependent_to.name: py-debtcollector
dependent_to.description:
A collection of Python deprecation patterns and strategies that help
you collect your technical debt in a non-destructive manner.

dependent_to.name: py-python-certifi-win32
dependent_to.description:
This package patches certifi at runtime to also include certificates
from the windows certificate store.

dependent_to.name: py-vcrpy
dependent_to.description:
Automatically mock your HTTP interactions to simplify and speed up
testing.
